title: Need to get back to NA
body: A long time ago i accidentally switched my NA account to Latam north (back when it was free to switch) so today i wanted to buy my account back so i went to my local store and bought some rp cards to switch back to NA, but the store says that i cannot use them on their server, i would like to get back to the region where i can understand whats is going on, so i was hoping you guys could help me get back to NA servers.(My account is currently is Latam north)

replies.body:
We may be able to figure a way to work this out if you reach us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialist will be happy to see what we can do.

Let me know if you have any questions.
